mapper.insert: insert into cart(us_no, prd_no, crt_qty) VALUES (#{us_no},#{prd_no},#{crt_qty})
mapper.update: update cart set crt_qty = #{crt_qty} where us_no = #{us_no} and prd_no = #{prd_no}
mapper.select: SELECT img_file, img_type, prd_no FROM ( SELECT i.img_file, i.img_type, c.prd_no, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.prd_no ORDER BY c.prd_no) AS rn FROM image i INNER JOIN cart c ON i.prd_no = c.prd_no ) WHERE rn = 1
